lender.occupational_info: Our company does land acquisitions primarily for master plan developers. When we acquire a piece of property that will make a great investment we create a Private Placement. lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because:
IF you read this I need help...
First I would like to start off by saying this is not a sob story and I'm not the type of person who likes asking for help. People turn to me for help. I've never liked asking people to do things for me because some how people in my life would find reason not to come through. Well I really need a loan to get back on my feet my job went out of business and for the last six months I've been trying find a job with no luck. I have been penny pinching and fall short on my bills... close to being homeless soon. I have been in business for myself, but when my job closed I wasn't financially stable to pay the business bills much less my own and I started borrowing from the business to support myself. I'm not sure how this site works, but I don't know where else to turn to get help before I lose everything! I speak to GOD everyday guide me through this point in my life of uncertainty. I'm hoping someone with a kind heart can help me get my life back on point. I have a business plan, but I am not credit worthy to apply for a loan through the bank by myself. Ii don't know what to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am unemployed

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I know exactly where my money is going, plus I can help more people once the loan is repaid.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky all my life, and for the rest of it I intend to share my good fortune as much as I can. I have grown up all over the world, including the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. Born in a third world country myself I know the only way to solve poverty is through hard work and opportunity. Hopefully I can help with the latter.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a designer and entrepreneur. Last year I started my own design firm in Singapore and will be expanding this year onwards throughout Asia. My company's purpose is to solve problems through design, even when those problems seem monumental. Sometimes the best solutions are the simplest in design. The imbalance of wealth in the world can only be fixed if those on the favored side are willing to share. That's why I love Kiva. My company will donate a significant portion of its earnings to Kiva over the coming years as it grows, and I hope to impact positively on the world in this small way.

lender.name: bay
lender.occupational_info:
Larry Baker, the Principal of BaySys Technology, has close to 20 years experience in the financial industry with emphasis on data management, technology, and back office systems. He has been responsible for the development and operation of systems and technology for portfolio accounting, trading and reporting services.
After 8 years at Advent Software, he joined a Broker/Dealerthat eventually launched an outsourcing data management firm. As President of this outsourcing firm, he oversaw a team that reconciled and provided daily support for over 75 Broker/Dealer and Advisory firms, reconciling over 30,000 accounts.

lender.occupational_info: I ask companies to supply their best price for goods and services. The winning company is then put on a contract which I review every few months.

lender.name: David,Kats, Risa & Noah
lender.loan_because: "Teach a man to fish......" it just makes sense, empowerment for a sustainable future. Why not create that chance, no man is an island. And when someone has been given much, much will be required in return; and when someone has been entrusted with much, even more will be required.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing Consultant

lender.name: Noriko
lender.loan_because: I want to support someone to be happy.

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: I want to see someone else's dream come true. I also like feeling like I am making a difference in someone's life. If I ever have kids, I want to start off by setting a great example.
lender.occupational_info: I own an errand/concierge service. I run everyday errands for individuals who are either pressed for time or are unable to complete the errand due to physical limitations.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people attempting to improve their standard of living in a proactive way.
